title: I got an S- on KhaZix...
body: I was playing one for all, with khazix. We did well and cruhed a team of Irelias. I was in the ending screen, and i notice nothing notified me for a lvl 6 token. I look in hextech and its not there. Why? is this a bug?

replies.body:
As *Lew* mentioned, only normal and ranked matches on Summoner's Rift are eligible games for earning Champion Mastery tokens. Any other game modes will not grant these tokens.

Our [Champion Mastery guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) goes over the entire system. Let me know if you have any questions.
You can only earn [mastery ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide)tokens on ranked or normal Summoner's rift.  Rotating game modes don't count.
